sentences: Tämä on viimeinen vuosi ennen valmistumista.
context: The Finnish word 'vuosi' means 'year' in English. It is a common noun used to refer to the period of time it takes for Earth to orbit around the sun, or more generally to any 12-month period. In Finnish grammar, 'vuosi' follows normal declension patterns and appears in various forms depending on case: vuosi (nominative), vuotta (partitive), vuodessa (inessive), etc.
